name: Lena Cross

idle: Jax? Yeah, I know him. Hard to forget someone like that.
He saved my life once. Don’t tell him I said that.
teasing: Jax always thinks he’s the smartest guy in the room.
Tell him he still owes me a drink.
serious: If Jax is mixed up in this… it’s bad.
FizzCo’s after him. And now they’re after you.

notes: Knows Jax from before the Vault 77 incident; carries emotional weight.
